title: Decay warnings during preseason
body: I've been getting the warnings since after the season ended, will I decay?...

replies.body: Since ranked is not officially enabled for season 7, there's nothing to decay.  Per the [Preseason FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/231832207-Preseason-FAQ), there's no decay during the preseason.  Hope that helps clear things up!
